readable.title: 2055646179_169807fed4
readable.content: A boy holding a hose next to a man while another boy watches on , held by a woman . A child is playing with a water spout outdoors while the rest of his family watches . A man in an orange shirt is helping a boy squirt water from a hose into a pond whilst a woman and boy watch . A smiling family congregate around a water spout in a pasture . A young child plays with a hose in a field with another child , and two adults .
